articles.titre: Article 1: Definitions
articles.résumé: Payment account: The payment account is an account within the meaning of CBT Circular No. 2018-16 of 31-12-2018.

articles.titre: Article 2: General conditions of use of a payment account
articles.résumé: The account is a payment account within the meaning of CBT circular No 2018-16 of 31-12-2018;The account is used, on an exclusive basis, to perform payment services as defined by articles 2 and 17

articles.titre: Article 3: Customer recognition and “KYC” data
articles.résumé: To comply with the requirements of the Circular of the CBT to payment institutions No 2018-16 of 31-12-2018 and in particular its requirements for the identification of customers; the following is planned

articles.titre: Article 4: Opening a payment account
articles.résumé: Enrollment methods: The opening of a payment account is possible remotely according to the e-KYC

articles.titre: Article 5 : Payment services accessible to the Customer
articles.résumé: Terms of access to the RIB, notice of operations, extract and statement of account: Through the application; the Client can consult, download and edit

articles.titre: Article 6 : Pricing conditions
articles.résumé: The pricing conditions, operations and payment services, are annexed to this agreement and form an integral part thereof.

articles.titre: Article 7 : Obligations of the parties
articles.résumé: The Customer is prohibited from opening more than one payment account with the Establishment.

articles.titre: Article 8 : Mediation
articles.résumé: Obligation of affiliation of the Establishment to the APTBEF

articles.titre: Article 9 : Termination
articles.résumé: Termination at the Customer's initiative: The agreement may be termin

articles.titre: Article 10 : Dormant or inactive accounts
articles.résumé: A payment account is considered inactive if there is no movement initiated by its

articles.titre: Article 11 : Force majeure
articles.résumé: Without this being limiting; are deemed to constitute a case of force majeure any event

articles.titre: Article 12 : Election of domicile
articles.résumé: For the execution of the agreement, the parties elect domicile in their above-mentioned residences.

articles.titre: Article 13 : Applicable law & competent jurisdiction
articles.résumé: The agreement is governed by Tunisian law.

articles.titre: A – General Guidelines for Data Collection and Processing
articles.résumé: The payment institution will make every effort to ensure the security and confidentiality of its customers' personal data in compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and the rule of law in place.

articles.titre: B – Identity of the Person in Charge of Data Processing

articles.titre: C – Purposes of Collecting and Processing Personal Data
articles.résumé: Customers' personal data are collected and processed for the purposes of managing the payment account, and the associated means of payment;

articles.titre: D – Collection and Processing of Personal Data
articles.résumé: In general, taking into account the level of payment account requested by the natural person customer, the data collected include

articles.titre: E – Requests for Information Concerning Suspicious Customer Transactions
articles.résumé: The Payment institution is subject to criminal sanctions that punish money laundering and financing of terrorism. The customer accepts that the Payment

articles.titre: Q01 : What is MillimePay ?
articles.résumé: MillimePay is a mobile application offered to you by your financial institution

articles.titre: Q02: What is a payment account?
articles.résumé: The payment account is an account used, on an exclusive basis, to perform payment services.

articles.titre: Q03: How to become a customer?
articles.résumé: Enrollment can be done remotely (e-KYC), with a payment agent or in a branch

articles.titre: Q04: What are the services offered by MillimePay?
articles.résumé: MillimePay allows you to initiate and/or receive on us and off us payment orders

articles.titre: Q05: Can i make a claim if necessary?
articles.résumé: MillimePay offers you the possibility to formulate claims and the financial institution undertakes to process

articles.titre: Q06: What to do if my phone is lost or stolen?
articles.résumé: MillimePay is an application secured by Login and Password.

articles.titre: Q07: What to do if you change your phone?
articles.résumé: With the new smartphone, you install MillimePay application.

articles.titre: Q08: What to do in case of change of mobile phone number?
articles.résumé: MillimePay offers you a service to change your telephone number.

articles.titre: Q09: What to do if you forget the password?
articles.résumé: MillimePay allows you to designate, during enrollment, an email address and/or a mobile phone number

articles.titre: Q10: Can i use MillimePay application if i don’t have internet access?
articles.résumé: An active internet connection – Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G –
